results.title: Compilation: animal movie
results.brief_description: Animal movie (Canada): An animated film to help children understand how animals move. “Martin the cobbler” (U.S.): A clay animated film about a Russian shoemaker who discovers new meanings in life by meditating on old truths. “Model railroading unlimited” (U.S.): A young man’s absorption in model railroading serves as the source of comedy.
results.description: Animal movie (Canada): An animated film to help children understand how animals move. “Martin the cobbler” (U.S.): A clay animated film about a Russian shoemaker who discovers new meanings in life by meditating on old truths. “Model railroading unlimited” (U.S.): A young man’s absorption in model railroading serves as the source of comedy.

results.title: Compilation Ultimate skills
results.brief_description: Ultimate skills (Australia): Three motorcycle champions explain and demonstrate their skills at trail riding, motocross and road riding. 2.” Survival of the fastest” (U.K.): Shows the evolution of the motorcycle from a primitive machine into a glamorous, sophisticated piece of engineering. Looks at research and development and compares British and Japanese bikes.

results.title: Compilation The Angel and the rat
results.brief_description: The Angel and the rat (Melbourne, dir. Steve McDonald): Examines the ideas and lifestyle of Smiley Williams, a young sculptor. “Heart, head and hand” (dir. Peter Weir): Scenes from the life and work of Australian potter, Peter Rushforth. “Natural glass” (N.Z. dir. John King ; prod. Derek Wright); Looks at a one-man revival of natural glassmaking in New Zealand.

results.title: Compilation skydive
results.creator_credit: Carl Boenish, Philip Dauber, Mike Vitlow and Devon Chierighlio
results.brief_description: Sky dive (U.S.); Carl Baenish, the world’s leading skydiving filmmaker shares some spectacular footage. “Spaceborne” (U.S.); An exciting selection of film footage taken during the manned moon flights. “The Wizard of speed and time” (U.S.); From out of his mountain cave blasts a Green Wizard moving at incredible speeds.

results.title: Competitive swimming: starts, turns, stroke drills
results.brief_description: Demonstrates the correct form for all swimming starts - grab start for freestyle, breaststroke and butterfly; correct entry for freestyle, butterfly and breaststroke; relay starts and the backstroke start for both long and short courses. Illustrates all turns, using slow motion and underwater camera, and also shows progressive drills for all strokes.

results.title: Competitive diving : Basic diving skills
results.brief_description: Covers basic skills of springboard and tower diving - approaches, take-offs, and basic dive positions (tuck, pike, straight and entry). No other credits available.

results.title: Compelling images (TEFC)
results.brief_description: Advertising images have to be in sympathy with the brand they are selling otherwise the product may be rejected. This program shows how a new commercial was made to update the image of Levi jeans for the ‘80s.
